txt.en: 'You have been a great boon to us, but I would imagine that my friend Amarion needs your help more than I.\n\n'He has stationed himself at Amon Raith just east of here, guarding a number of refugees of the North Downs. I know he could use help looking after them.'
'Mincham sent you, did he? Good man. I could use a capable pair of hands around here. There are many mouths to feed....'
Mincham has asked you to look in on Amarion, a fellow Ranger, who currently looks after a number of refugees nearby at the ruins of Amon Raith.
Amarion can be found at Amon Raith, east of Mincham's Camp.\n\nYou should speak with Amarion at Amon Raith.
Speak with Amarion at Amon Raith
